feed.title: Replay attacks make BIP148 and BIP149 untennable

entry.title: Replay attacks make BIP148 and BIP149 untennable
entry.summary: The sender of the email is inquiring about the term "148 coinbase coins" and its significance. They ask why these coins should be preferred over legacy coinbases. The recipient clarifies that "post-UASF coinbase coins" might be a better term for coins generated after the activation of UASF. The sender also adds a disclaimer requesting the recipient not to send anything via email that they are not comfortable sharing with the NSA.
